name: app-manager
title: Application Manager
description: Quickly view and quit running GUI applications with multi-selection support
author: sidkhuntia

commands.name: manage-running-apps
commands.title: Manage Running Apps
commands.subtitle: Application Manager
commands.description: View and quit running GUI applications

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
